coreAttributes.name: High Slit Halter Dress
coreAttributes.description: A long captivating high thigh cutout dress, complemented by a bold halter-style neckline and a deep cleavage cutout, comes together to create an irresistibly alluring and sophisticated look.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.steps] into the halter dress, before pulling it up around [npc.her] [npc.hips+] and [npc.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the halter dress, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] [npc2.hips+] and [npc2.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to [npc2.step] into the halter dress, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] [npc2.hips+] and [npc2.breasts+] and then tying the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps [npc.steps] out of [npc.her] halter dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.step] out of it.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.herHim] to [npc2.step] out of it.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt of [npc.her] halter dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] halter dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] halter dress back down into the proper position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] halter dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] halter dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the skirt of [npc2.namePos] halter dress, before roughly pulling it up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the straps of [npc.her] halter dress and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to shift aside around [npc.her] breasts.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to shift aside around [npc2.her] breasts.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(yank)] the top shift aside around [npc2.her] breasts.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc.her] halter dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] halter dress and [npc.verb(tie)] the straps into a loose bow behind [npc2.her] neck.
